entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning late this evening and ending before morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 26 February 2023
